channel.title: Rune-Z | Survival Mode | Updated : 2013/01/03 | Unique Concept | #1
channel.description:
[img]http://s1.postimage.org/cnzxdxcfj/runez.png[/img] [size=14pt]Zombies have taken over RS! Will you survive or will you be eaten?[/size] :eek: Hello, I hope my little introducting didn't scare you too much! :D Yeah, so there we go guys. A new RSPS. But, this one is completly different! [b]What is Rune-Z?[/b] Rune-Z is a survival mode RSPS. There is zombies all over the map which are agresive. You will have to find food else you will starve! You won't be able to fight zombies until you find a weapon(sword, axe, pickaxe, etc..)! The whole map is PVP zone, but there are Safe Zones as well, which allow you to bank your good stuff & log out in a safe spot. All the banks are Safe Zones. [hr] [b]What is done:[/b] -Wild Zone -Safe Zones (ALL banks on the map) -Website -Ranks -Starving System -Added Fishing -Added Cooking -Added Woodcutting -Added Firemaking -Fixed Clipping -Fixed NPC Clipping -More bugs fixed -Zombies are now Aggresive. -Disabled Teleporting -Disabled Duel Arena[/b] [hr] [b]To do:[/b] -Random drops over the map -Spawn Zombies -New Skill: Thirst (same as HP (dropping every minute) but, you will need water to get it up) -More features as we'll get suggestions... [hr] Few Pictures: Edgeville Safe Zone: [img]http://s1.postimage.org/f0tlxa5a7/safe.png[/img] Edgeville Wild Zone: [img]http://s8.postimage.org/ukfjhqjqd/wild.png[/img] Varrock Safe Zone: [img]http://s7.postimage.org/qj3vn3txn/varrock.png[/img] Varrock Wild Zone: [img]http://s7.postimage.org/tsmw7b7ez/wildvarrock.png[/img] A little photoshop creation: [img]http://s7.postimage.org/lqynpeonf/login.png[/img] Starving System: [youtube]http://youtu.be/t-O_4b32kMc[/youtube] [hr] [B][U]2012/12/30 Updates[/U][/B] [IMG]http://s13.postimage.org/oul425opz/ernergy.png[/img] [b]Added Energy System. Zombies are now Aggresive. Disabled Teleporting Disabled Duel Arena[/b]
[b]Update 2013/01/03:[/b] -Added Fishing -Added Cooking -Added Woodcutting -Added Firemaking -Fixed Clipping -Fixed NPC Clipping -More bugs fixed [b]Available skills in beta:[/b] Combat Skills: Attack, Strength, Defence, Range, Mage. Skills: Cooking, Woodcutting, Firemaking, Fishing [b]Why only 9 skills?[/b] This is only beta, and these are the skills which allows you to survive. Eventually, we'll add other skills, which will help the player create his own equipments, potions, etc. Info: HitPoints are set to 99 form the start, you lose 1 life point every single minute. You have enough time to find food. Spoil: Maximum attack, strenght, range, mage levels: 60 Maximum Defence level: 40 Maximum Prayer level: 52 (you start with 52) Maximum skilling levels: 99 XP rate: Low ;) Beta Starter Combat level:40 (10 atk, 10 str, 10 def, 52 pray, 10 range, 10 mage, 99 hp) Beta Maximum Combat level: 80 (60 atk, 60 str, 40 def, 52 pray, 60 range, 10 mage, 99hp) Why?: We don't want a big level difference between our players.
[hr] So yeah guys, I am waiting your suggestions & feedbacks. Positive & Negative. Helpers are accepted. Rune-Z

item.title: Rune-Z | Survival Mode | Updated : 2013/01/03 | Unique Concept | #1
item.dc:creator: @rune-z rune-z
item.description:
@rune-z wrote:

[quote=“artem543, post:49, topic:477043”]I just finished reading the whole thread. This actually made my day(specially Fails’s comments). I don’t see this going far. The whole project doesn’t seems profesional to me. Whatever, This is not flaming. I’ve seen many attempts to accomplish a project. Even me, I’ve made thousands of projects… Just don’t quit. You can start over and over. but don’t quit. Also, make backups. I’ve lost a freaking awsomme server because of a huge packet handling error.

*Rune-z, people will write on your thread. Don’t get mad or depressed. Just work on your project and prove something.[/quote]

yeah, from now on i’ll post only some of my updates.

Read full topic

I just finished reading the whole thread. This actually made my day(specially Fails’s comments). I don’t see this going far. The whole project doesn’t seems profesional to me. Whatever, This is not flaming. I’ve seen many attempts to accomplish a project. Even me, I’ve made thousands of projects… Just don’t quit. You can start over and over. but don’t quit. Also, make backups. I’ve lost a freaking awsomme server because of a huge packet handling error.

*Rune-z, people will write on your thread. Don’t get mad or depressed. Just work on your project and prove something.

item.title: Rune-Z | Survival Mode | Updated : 2013/01/03 | Unique Concept | #1
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

zyle1992:

I have cleaned this thread 5 times in the last week. That is absolutely unacceptable. I’m surprised that most of that was from known members.

We’re not making you clean this thread, you’re choosing to do so. Is it unacceptable? Yes. However, this community isn’t going anywhere, I don’t know why you all have to be so strict.

zyle1992:

@arham 4: My apologies if you feel that the services provided by the voluntary staff are not what you expect. I try to be fair and just in my decisions, but I’m sure you’ll agree that having to clean 2-3 pages worth of junk, 5 times in one week is unacceptable.

Not all the spam/flame was coming from Arham, it was evenly distributed among myself, clawz, and arham. Banning us for 3 days is somewhat unfair, everyday people flame their ass off (some cases worse than this one) and all they get is a slap on the wrist.

zyle1992:

@Fails: I’m sure you’ll agree to the previous statement. I do not intend to be a “dickhead mod”, but then again, I don’t care much.

Then why are you a mod if you don’t intend to be liked by others? And I don’t want to hear that “I’m just doing my job” bullshit either.

zyle1992:

@rune-z: You are no better than the people who were spamming, trolling, and flaming in YOUR development thread. Know that I find your behavior abhorent, and frankly I believe you deserve more than a warning.

Finally, I agree with you!

zyle1992:

You are free to criticize, but attempt to make it constructive, and avoid turning it into flaming, spamming, or trolling.

I’m afraid to even post anything constructive on this thread, rune-z will just turn it into a flame war, thus getting us all punished.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Z | Survival Mode | Updated : 2013/01/03 | Unique Concept | #1
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I have cleaned this thread 5 times in the last week. That is absolutely unacceptable. I’m surprised that most of that was from known members.

@arham 4: My apologies if you feel that the services provided by the voluntary staff are not what you expect. I try to be fair and just in my decisions, but I’m sure you’ll agree that having to clean 2-3 pages worth of junk, 5 times in one week is unacceptable.

@Fails: I’m sure you’ll agree to the previous statement. I do not intend to be a “dickhead mod”, but then again, I don’t care much.

@rune-z: You are no better than the people who were spamming, trolling, and flaming in YOUR development thread. Know that I find your behavior abhorent, and frankly I believe you deserve more than a warning.

@Thread: Criticism is still expected in development threads. If you don’t criticize developments (ideally constructively), then they cannot benefit or flourish, and become stagnant, which is the enemy of progress, in every sense. Do not think that what I said means that you should praise every development thread that comes along. That is not constructive in any manner.

You are free to criticize, but attempt to make it constructive, and avoid turning it into flaming, spamming, or trolling.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Z | Survival Mode | Updated : 2013/01/03 | Unique Concept | #1
item.dc:creator: @rune-z rune-z
item.description:
@rune-z wrote:

Update 2013/01/03:
-Added Fishing
-Added Cooking
-Added Woodcutting
-Added Firemaking
-Fixed Clipping
-Fixed NPC Clipping
-More bugs fixed

Available skills in beta:
Combat Skills: Attack, Strength, Defence, Range, Mage.
Skills: Cooking, Woodcutting, Firemaking, Fishing

Why only 9 skills?
This is only beta, and these are the skills which allows you to survive.
Eventually, we’ll add other skills, which will help the player create his own equipments, potions, etc.

Info: HitPoints are set to 99 form the start, you lose 1 life point every single minute. You have enough time to find food.

Spoil:
Maximum attack, strenght, range, mage levels: 60
Maximum Defence level: 40
Maximum Prayer level: 52 (you start with 52)
Maximum skilling levels: 99
XP rate: Low

Beta Starter Combat level:40 (10 atk, 10 str, 10 def, 52 pray, 10 range, 10 mage, 99 hp)
Beta Maximum Combat level: 80 (60 atk, 60 str, 40 def, 52 pray, 60 range, 10 mage, 99hp)

Why?:
We don’t want a big level difference between our players.

More to come!

Read full topic
